post: Joe Nickell has been repeating his schtick about a rubbing from a bas relief for at least 20 years now. You would think in 20 years he should be able to make an image just like the shroud himself, if it is so simple. Isn’t there even a monetary prize offered by someone?.
title: Crocumentaries

author: matt_kowalski
post: About 25 years I saw a big coffee table style book in a store about the most influential people in history. Can’t remember the author or exact title. They had Mohammad number 1 and Isaac Newton as 2. Jesus was 3. They gave a reason for this, but it was obvious anyway that “the fix was in”. I was still young enough at the time to be learning about anti Christian bias in certain cultural circles..
title: How the Shroud Becomes Part of the Conversation
